name: Going (Prototype)
description:
Here's a small prototype that I've been working on over the past couple of weeks. It's an exploration of my experience of working with depression during university, and losing control beneath an approaching deadline.

Going is quite abstract and odd, so I completely understand if it's not to your tastes. Although I don't know whether I'll be developing it further (I'm moving onto another small prototype now that this is uploaded), I definitely welcome any feedback. Really, hearing from players is the best, and I'd like to improve as a game designer and developer.

Anyway, thanks for reading.

- Dean

Controls
  • Move:
    • WASD
    • Arrow Keys
    • Left Stick
  • Exit:
    • Escape Key
-CONTENT WARNING-

This game contains imagery and themes relating to depression, self-harm and suicide. If any of that may be distressing to you, please take care of yourself and do not download this prototype. Also, please be aware that this game contains bright colours moving at potentially high speeds, so those suffering from photosensitive epilepsy should probably give it a miss.
